resources.string:
You will make all these changes in the XML code and in the strings.xml file.
 You will edit the XML code for the layout in the Text pane,
 which you show by clicking the Text tab, rather than clicking the Design tab for the Design pane.
 
 Some changes to UI elements and attributes are easier to
 make directly in the Text pane using XML source code.
